attributes.action: Suspend Brexit, hold confirmatory EU referendum, & investigate cyberwarfare
attributes.additional_details: Because Brexit is most damaging self-inflicted action by UK, obviously damaging, serious lies surrounded obtaining result & we now know cyberwarfare element actively avoided investigation. Russia report raises enough questions about cyberwarfare and misinformation affecting our democratic process for a confirmatory referendum to be ESSENTIAL. Because Putin has given himself until 2036 in office and his intentions to dominate are clear. UK needs to protect itself now and not wait a moment longer.
attributes.background: Suspend Brexit final transition date, hold final confirmatory EU referendum, & investigate cyberwarfare involving Russia and other malicious powers in relation to UK democracy

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petition which call for an extension of the transition period:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329500
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332278
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303686

You may also wish to sign these petitions relating to potential interference in UK democracy by Russia:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332295
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332293

You could start a petition calling for a referendum on the UK seeking to rejoin the EU, if that is something you'd like to happen.
